channel.title: Posts on Yiyi Wang

item.description:
About me

Hi everyone, I’m Yiyi Wang, a Ph.D. student in Computer Science & Engineering at University of South Florida. Currently, I am in Pi Lab, under the supervision of Prof. Jiajun Huang. I got my bachelor degree in Computer Science and Technology at Wuhan University. I got my master degree in Language Technology at University of Gothenburg.

Highlight Projects

Master Thesis –Student Intern in Sinch

  • Prompt strategy on the code generation by LLMs (Master Thesis Pass with Distinction)

Work Project –Software Engineer
